name: CA$HOUT
description:
Press HOW TO PLAY on the menu for controls.

Navigate four floors in this money heisting roguelike! Your ammo's valuable; miss a shot and you'll never see that coin again. Shoot and roll your way to the top of a heavily-guarded office in CA$HOUT!

NOTE: This game was largely tested on the WINDOWS build. HTML build is subject to instability and lag, in addition to SFX and VFX bugs. That, and, I forgot to export the windows build, so...
